column4: i installed ubuntu-restricted-extras but still no video in kaffeine
mplayer is not installed, do kaffein need it ?
i installed mplyer, still no video in kaffeine
what kind of stream is it? DVB mpeg2 of some sort, avc or what ... ?
from kafeine faq: "Live DVB playback only works with the xine engine. Go to Menu->Settings->Engine and choose "Kaffeine-Xine". Then restart Kaffeine."
based on the faq no, since it uses xine engine only for DVB
also mplayer should play mpeg2 natively, no need for codec packs, so no again
can you open that stream in mplayer directly?
